entry.def: Utilitarianism is the idea that the morally correct course of action is the one that produces benefit for the greatest number of people.

means.word_mean: 1. doctrine that the useful is the good; especially as elaborated by Jeremy Bentham and James Mill; the aim was said to be the greatest happiness for the greatest number
